mapper.select: SELECT CHPTR_ID, LECT_ID, NAME, NUM, LENGTH, REGDATE, DOC, VIDEO FROM CHAPTER WHERE LECT_ID = #{lectId} ORDER BY NUM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAPTER (CHPTR_ID, LECT_ID, NAME, NUM, LENGTH, DOC, VIDEO, REGDATE) VALUES ('CH_' || SEQ_CHAPTER_ID.NEXTVAL, #{lectId}, #{name}, #{num}, #{length}, #{doc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
